property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove 1 foundation in your discard pile from the game: Ready 1 of your foundations that shares a name with the removed foundation. E Commit 1 foundation, name a card. Your Punch or Weapon attack gets +1 damage for each copy of the named card in your removed from game pile.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: This attack gains Stun: 2. E Discard 1 momentum: Your next check to play a Punch or Weapon attack gets +2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your next Punch attack gets +3 damage. E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack’s speed is 5 or greater, draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Ready 1 foundation that has not been readied this Combat Phase. E: If this attack deals damage, commit 1 of your opponent’s foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your Punch attacks get +2 damage. E Commit 2 foundations: Ready 2 foundations that have not been readied this Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your attack gets +1 speed. R Commit: After your opponent plays an on-character ability that would flip 1 of your foundations, add the top card of your deck to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You can have up to 16 copies of this card in your deck. R: After this card is committed or readied during the Enhance Step, this attack gets +1 or -1 speed. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Search your deck for up to 2 foundations and add them to your discard pile. E Commit, remove 2 foundations in your discard pile from the game: Both players discard 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove 2 foundations in your discard pile from the game: Ready this foundation. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Before the game begins, search your deck for up to 3 copies of “Edward and Ein” and attach them to this card, then shuffle your deck. E [Your turn] Add 1 attached character from your staging area to your hand: Your opponent discards 1 card. If the discarded card was a non-attack card, draw 1 card or commit 1 of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: Attach 1 character card from your discard pile (that you could normally attach) to your starting character. E Remove: Add 1 character card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Look at your opponent’s hand and discard 1 card of your choice from it.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: After you make a check to play this card, that check gets +2. E Reduce this attack’s speed to 0. This attack gets +5 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent discards 1 card and draws 1 card. If the discarded card was a non-attack card, this attack gets +3 speed. E Discard 1 card with a printed control of 6. Draw 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Add 1 card with a printed control of 6 from your discard pile to your hand. Combo E Discard 1 card: This attack gets a damage bonus equal to the printed control of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: This attack gets a speed bonus equal to the printed difficulty of the discarded card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, your other attacks get +1 damage. E: If this is your first attack this turn, this attack gets +2 speed and Stun: 2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Add 1 of your opponent’s assets or foundations to the top of their deck. E: If your next attack has Ally, add 1 card (that you can normally play) with a printed control of 6 from your discard pile to your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Once per turn, after this foundation is committed due to your opponent’s effect, ready it. E Commit, discard 1 card: Your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E [Opponent’s attack] Commit: Switch this attack’s speed and damage values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After your opponent discards any number of cards from their hand during the Combat Phase, they discard 1 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: This attack gets -3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, flip: After your opponent plays an ability that would increase this attack’s damage, cancel its effects.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you take 5 or more damage, add the top card of your deck to your momentum. E [Once per turn] Discard 1 momentum: Draw 1 card. You may flip 1 of your opponent’s assets. Playable while committed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Flip: Seal 1 of your opponent’s foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit your character: Both players discard 2 cards and draw 2 cards. E Destroy, discard 1 card with a printed control of 6: Reduce this attack’s damage to 1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you check this card, you may add 1 character card that shares a name with your starting character from your discard pile to your hand. E Commit: Commit 1 asset or foundation in your opponent’s staging area with 1 or more keywords.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If the top card of your discard pile has no block, add it to your momentum. If it has a +1 or +2 block, this attack gets +2 or -2 damage. If it has a +3 block, this attack gets +2 or -2 speed. If it has a +4 block or higher, add 1 asset or Tech attack from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove: Your Ranged, Tech or Weapon attack gets +6 damage. You may add 1 card from your discard pile to the top of your discard pile. E: This attack gets -5 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your next check gets +2. E: If your opponent does not attempt to block this attack, they add 1 card from their hand to their card pool face down.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Combo E: Add 1 Tech attack from your card pool to your hand. Remove this attack from the game after it resolves. Deadlock E: Add the top card of your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Add this attack to your staging area face down after it resolves.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If you have at least 1 momentum, add the top card of your discard pile to your momentum. Deadlock E: This attack gets Multiple: 3.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard the top card of your deck: This attack gets a damage bonus equal to the discarded card’s block modifier. Deadlock E: Your next check to play an attack gets +5.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
